amendment.description: To extend the moratorium on the closing and consolidation of postal facilities or post offices, stations, or branches.

action.text: Amendment SA 2079 proposed by Senator Manchin to Amendment SA 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2079, under the order of 4/19/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 53. Record Vote Number: 77.
